body.name: Progress Lighting P4008-31 Five Light Chandeliers, 21-Inch Diameter x 16-Inch Height, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 43 mins
features: SIMPLE CLASSIC DESIGN: Incorporate a simple, classic lighting design into your home décor with the Five Light Collection’s Five-Light Chandelier is ideal for any dining room or sitting room in new traditional or rustic settings.
WHITE-SLEEVED LIGHT BASES: White-sleeved candle covers decorate light bases as they surround the vintage frame.
TEXTURED BLACK FINISH: Swooping curved arms coated in a farmhouse-inspired textured black finish add volume to the light fixture.

WARRANTY: Our 1-year Limited Warranty guarantees your complete satisfaction with your purchase and includes professional after-sales customer service support. Make your purchase today to begin your journey to a whole new lighting experience.
Dimensions: Width/Diameter: 21 Inches, Height: 16 Inches, Mount Type: Ceiling Chain
Progress Lighting has over 5,000 lighting fixtures offered in our catalog, the largest single source for residential and commercial lighting
body.description: Product Description Incorporate a simple, classic lighting design into your home décor with the Five Light Collection’s Five-Light Chandelier. White-sleeved candle covers decorate light bases as they surround the vintage frame. Swooping curved arms add volume to the light fixture as they flow down from a linked chain to hold the light bases in place. A decorative loop hangs at the bottom of the design to complete the look. The frame is coated in a farmhouse-inspired textured black finish. For optimal illumination, the chandelier uses five candelabra base bulbs that are sold separately (60w max – LED, CFL, halogen, or incandescent). With the ability to be fully dimmable with dimmable bulbs, the light fixture offers endless versatility when it comes to finding a place in your home décor vision. The light fixture’s classic design is ideal for any dining room or sitting room in new traditional or rustic settings. It’s time to breathe new life into the mundane every day with timeless and truly transformative lighting. Make your purchase today to begin your journey to a whole new lighting experience. Progress Lighting products are designed for exceptional quality, reliability, and functionality. Amazon.com Progress Lighting's Five-Light chandeliers offer fixtures with a versatile collection of finished that illuminate and beautify any space in your home.Traditional Styling for Any Room of the HomeThese five-light chandeliers offer casual styling with traditional undertones, perfect for today's inspired interiors. White candle covers and a candelabra base complete this classic fixture, which comes complete with 6' of 9 gauge chain and 10' of wire.Add a Traditional Touch with a ChandelierChandeliers are more than just beautiful fixtures - they are ideal for providing functional illumination throughout your home.Consider adding a Progress Lighting chandelier to beautifully illuminate:Great RoomsDining rooms and bar surfacesSitting rooms and work spacesBedroom and bathroom areasHall and Foyer areasBeauty and Lasting DurabilityProgress Lighting's five light chandelier features a long-lasting solid steel construction and a durable Textured Black finish for years of decorative illumination.The Progress Lighting DifferenceProgress Lighting responds to the ever-changing needs of the lighting industry with extensive research and development programs that ensure high standards of quality and innovation for the home. The manufacturer's product design team is in tune with the wants and needs of today's consumer - and strives to develop beautiful, functional products that exceed expectations. From the Manufacturer A classic Shaker style fixture designed for the beauty of pure simplicity. Traditional candle lights are complemented by a bobeche with matching candle cups. Five-light chandelier. Uses (5) 60-Watt candelabra bulbs 21-Inch Diameter x 16-Inch Height See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Five-Light Textured Black White Candles Traditional Chandelier Light This simple, classic five-light chandelier is popular in the vintage farmhouse inspired designs. White candle covers and a decorative loop detail complete the look. Black finish.

Dimming This fixture is dimmable when used with compatible wall dimmer and with light bulbs that can be dimmed. Sizing for Chandeliers To calculate the correct width, start with the width of your table and subtract 12 inches. Based on an 8-foot ceiling, it should hang between 30 to 36 inches above the table. Customize with Bulbs With a variety of shapes and color, light bulbs can make a unique statement and compliment the design style of your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We just installed this fixture and it looks beautiful! Was easy to install and love Progress Lighting. The fixtures are well made and a great value. Would not hesitate to recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I was like "YES! " I was all set to press ...
reviews.reviewText: This fixture lights up my life! (And my dining room:) Have adimired this style fixture for years, I seem to have champagne tastes with beer wallet, so when I saw this on Amazon, I was like "YES!" I was all set to press the order key, when I saw the ad for used fixtures pop up. After reading many reviews about people who purchased used lights, (I'm a fan of reading other's reviews, just usually don't write them myself) it was something I was willing to try. Fixture was in like new box, plastic, etc. Can't even tell where used comes in to play, and my electrician husband hung easily, day before house full of guests. Room is 10x10, with a bay window. Light is classy, simple and not overpowering. I do recommend a dimmer switch if you can put one in. That is next on my honey-to-do list. My guests loved the light and was easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2014
reviews.reviewText: If you like Shaker type furniture, Primitive type furniture or even the straight lines of Craftsman furniture this might appeal to you. It is made well and nice to look at. It is not large which is what I was looking for.I have bought inexpensive cloth shades/paper shades to dress it up. For Christmas I wove some authentic looking white pine roping at the base of it and it looked very cozy. I like the loop at the bottom because I can also dangle a prism from it if I like.It also looks very nice as it is. However, its simplicity allows you to do a lot of neat things with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive, but nice.
reviews.reviewText: Install was easy and looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple design but classy
reviews.reviewText: I didn't want a light that was fussy and difficult to clean. This one was spot on. It has a nice clean appearance and yet dresses up my dining room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2013
reviews.reviewText: Good quality, nice clean design. This made a huge impact on the overall feel of the room. Not very busy, so if you looking for something elegant, yet simple, this is a good choice.My only negative aspect of this was the chain link adjustment. Sure I can open the link with pliers and close it back up, but you can aslo chip the finish on the links. Maybe they could supply one master link type link. I know ideally you only set it up once, but incase you had to move it up or down at times, you would have a fairly simple option.I'm happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very nice but Consider usage. It didn't work for me.
reviews.reviewText: This is a good quality chandelier. In a dining room, it would work perfectly. I needed it for my kitchen where requirements are different. I read the newspaper and do my paperwork at the kitchen table. The saucers (?) under each light are too large for that purpose. They throw too much shadow on my reading. They are so noticeable that I placed glass globs in each one. It looked nice. In my dining room I have a similar chandelier. The saucers don't matter on that as I never need to read at that table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just right for my dining room.
It is great quality, exactly as described!
Only an okay rating...hangs crooked and candles will need covers (cheap yellow plastic).
